entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023
